name: Murphey Candler Park
description: Murphey Clader is a 135 acre park in brookhaven. It has a large lake, a pool, hiking trails, and picnic areas. It has a large youth sports complex with a number of baseball, softball and football fields.
parking: Murphey Candler has lots of parking surrounding the lake off West Nancy Creek Drive  as well as across the street at the football/baseball fields.
hours: Thursday12–6PM Friday12–8PM Saturday1–6PM Sunday1–6PM Monday12–6PM Tuesday12–8PM Wednesday12–6PM
